content: Phase 1: Core POC - OpenAI Vision ID extraction test

Phase 2: Get design guidelines from design agent
Phase 2: Backend implementation (FastAPI endpoints, MongoDB models)

Phase 2: All user stories covered in Development and testing
Phase 2: End to End Testing using Testing Agent
Phase 3: PMS integration, export, bulk improvements
